text: Balo -- ''ke tomadera jibika dana kare mahakasamandala o prthibi theke? Athaba srabanasakti o drstisakti kara kartrtbadhina? Ara ke mrta theke jibitake nirgata kare o jibita theke mrtake nirgata kare? Ara ke bisaya-asaya niyantrana kare?’’ Takhana tara balabe -- ''allah‌.’’ Tahale balo -- ''tabe kena tomara dharmaparayanata abalanbana karo na?’’
